name: SNOK-World best online multiplayer snooker game!
name_original: SNOK-World best online multiplayer snooker game!
description:
World best online multiplayer snooker game!

This version is one off version of "SnookerWorld".
Packaged without ads and initial offers 10000 coins and 10 cash.

Features:
Snooker, 8 ball pool and 9 ball pool all in one.

NEWBIE TRAINING
Training courses for newbie. Learn snooker skills and operations.

1-ON-1 RANDOM MATCH
Random play with world wide snooker players.

ARENA of Professional, Master and Hardcore
Higher coin and experience point reward.

PLAY WITH FRIEND

CUES AND TABLES
Rich cues and tables you can select.

LEVEL UP
Level up with your wins.

LEADERBOARD
World wide ranking of players winning.

INGAME CHAT
Voice chat with player from anywhere in game.

ACHIEVEMENTS
Reach achievement to get rewards.
